main event: A UFO sighting occurred at the Army Air Force in the Azores on October 24, 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as a white light bulb with a yellowish tint,The object was seen spinning upright and moving at a speed of 50-150 MPH,No sound was reported from the object during the sighting,The estimated distance of the object from the observer was 5-7 miles,The sighting occurred between 2300Z to 0330Z.
